page.title: 02WAY OF LIFE
page.content:
This area,being nearly all farmland has very few homes in it.They include bungalows,mobile homes,semi-detached and detached homes.Property tends to be a little cheaper here than in other areas in the south east England. Possible reasons being the lack of amenities and the proximity of the { {Gatwick Flight Path. Property prices - June 1985 Bungalow 3 bed. detached Â£70,000 Semi_detached 3 bed. Â£50,000 Detached 3 bed. Â£65,000 Detached 4 bed. Â£80,000
Most people work within 5-10 mile radius,including {Gatwick}and{Crawley, but some commute to {London}, which involves a journey to {Gatwick }or { {Horley}then a train journey of 35-55 { { {
